definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: Pricks his thin claw within some delicate nerve;
sentences.chinese: 以尖刻的爪子，刺痛敏感的神經。

sentences.english: Sixth, citation studies are highly field-sensitive.
sentences.chinese: 第六，引用研究對領域具有高度敏感性。

sentences.english: He is perfect as the sensitive but strong reporter.
sentences.chinese: 他把一個敏感而言詞犀利的記者演得完美無缺。

sentences.english: Recommended for all non-sensitive skin types.
sentences.chinese: 各種皮膚，敏感皮膚不建議使用。

sentences.english: Serum TC level is a sensitive contacting biomarker of excessive iodine.
sentences.chinese: 血脂爲高碘接觸的最敏感指標。

sentences.english: You normally have never been date-specific.
sentences.chinese: 你平常從沒有對日期特別敏感。

sentences.english: The role of Germany is a sensitive one.
sentences.chinese: 德國在其中是一個敏感的角色。

sentences.english: Odontoid fracture could not be shown with CT if without atlantoaxial dislocation.
sentences.chinese: CT對無移位的齒狀突骨折和輕度環樞椎脫位不敏感。

sentences.english: Best body wash I've been able to find for my sensitive skin.
sentences.chinese: 我是敏感性皮膚，這是我用過的最好的沐浴乳。

sentences.english: However, sensitive spots can be found there as well.
sentences.chinese: 但是也有一些敏感部位血很多。

sentences.english: Music lessons and practice during childhood increase the sensitivity of the brain stem to the sounds of human speech.
sentences.chinese: 兒童時期的音樂課和練習會增加腦幹對人聲的敏感性。

sentences.english: Enolase isolated from peas was sensitive to fluoride .
sentences.chinese: 從豌豆提取的烯醇酶對氟化物敏感。

sentences.english: You will be extremely sentimental, and if pushed by others you may hold a lasting grudge.
sentences.chinese: 你會非常敏感，如果別人惹了你，你可能會記仇。

sentences.english: The anaerobe resistance fungus medicine has the stable sensitivity.
sentences.chinese: 厭氧菌對抗菌藥物有較穩定的敏感性。

sentences.english: There have existed a large number of poems with "heart-broken" themes in the middle and late Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 中晚唐詩人具有不同於初唐和盛唐詩人的敏感性。

sentences.english: Try your best to sidestep for sensitive issues like this.
sentences.chinese: 你應儘可能地迴避像這類敏感的問題。

definition: slow in one's reactions/sluggish (in movement or thought)
to touch/(fig.) to touch on (a matter)
